import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";Chart.register(ArcElement,CategoryScale,LinearScale,Tooltip,Legend);const Dropdown=_ref=>{let{selectedMonth,setSelectedMonth}=_ref;const months=[{value:"01",label:"January"},{value:"02",label:"February"},{value:"03",label:"March"},{value:"04",label:"April"},{value:"05",label:"May"},{value:"06",label:"June"},{value:"07",label:"July"},{value:"08",label:"August"},{value:"09",label:"September"},{value:"10",label:"October"},{value:"11",label:"November"},{value:"12",label:"December"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{value:selectedMonth,onChange:e=>setSelectedMonth(e.target.value),children:months.map(month=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:month.value,children:month.label},month.value))});};export default Dropdown;
